thread.title: WATCH || Behind-the-scenes of win over Tennessee
thread.title_full: WATCH || Behind-the-scenes of win over Tennessee

title: WATCH || Behind-the-scenes of win over Tennessee
text:
Manage WATCH || Behind-the-scenes of win over Tennessee Go behind-the-scenes of Kentucky's 83-58 win over Tennessee at Rupp Arena Tuesday night with this feature from KY Wildcats TV. 
Go behind-the-scenes of Kentucky's 83-58 win over Tennessee at Rupp Arena Tuesday night with this feature from KY Wildcats TV. 
The Wildcats (21-5, 11-2 SEC) avenged its 82-80 loss to the Volunteers in Knoxville Jan. 24. 
Get the latest UK news sent straight to your inbox with out EMAIL NEWSLETTER 
Kentucky hit 10 of its 11 three-pointers in the first half in building a 47-32 halftime lead. For the game, UK held UT to 34.6 percent shooting and a season-low 58 points. 
Malik Monk scored 20 points and pulled down a career-best eight rebounds, Derek Willis scored 16 points on a quartet of three-pointers and Dominique Hawkins added a season-high 10 points. 
It marked Kentucky's 10th straight win over the Vols at Rupp Arena dating back to 2006. Author
